featured.text: The slow and clumsy wetas have been around on the island since the times of the dinosaurs, and have evolved and survived in an environment where they had no enemies until rats came to the island with European immigrants.
Another 36 claims that David Jung, a Chinese immigrant living in Los Angeles, created the fortune cookie in 1918.
Like most immigrants, he was 22 a better life.
However, the more generally accepted story is that the fortune cookie first 38 in either 1907 or 1914 in San Francisco, created by a Japanese immigrant, Makoto Hagiwara.
While adapting to western ways of living, many Asian immigrants in the US still try hard to _____

definition.zh_def: 移民；指從一個國家或地區移居到另一個國家或地區的人。
definition.en_def: A person who comes to live permanently in a foreign country.
definition.example: The immigrant family worked hard to build a new life in their new home.
